segments.text: Hi , I need a hotel room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's no problem at all . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . My name is John Sandals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a pleasure , Mr . Sandals . My name is Michelle . What days will you need a room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Friday afternoon , April 14 through Monday morning , April 17 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One minor problem , sir . Our prices are now slightly higher . Is that acceptable , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please tell me the price , so I can make a decision .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good ! Now , sir , do you have a preference for smoking or nonsmoking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hear you , sir . Nonsmoking . Now , about the bed , is a queen-size okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , sir , let me reserve those dates , there . Now , if you'll just tell me your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's 626-555-1739 . Thank you so much for choosing our hotel , sir !
segments.speaker: S2
